summary: The implementation covers all 19 requirements with comprehensive backend and frontend components. Backend includes Product and BusinessInfo data models, Internet Identity authentication, CRUD operations, and business info management. Frontend includes all required pages (Home, Products, ProductDetail, About, Contact, Admin Dashboard, Admin Products, Admin Business Info) with responsive design, agricultural green theme, navigation header, authentication UI, and static image integration. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode theme support via ThemeProvider from next-themes
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention dark mode or theme switching functionality. The implementation includes dark mode CSS variables and ThemeProvider integration.

hallucinated_features.description: Social media links in footer (Facebook, Twitter/X, Instagram)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify social media integration or links. Footer component includes social media icons and placeholder links.

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai branding and attribution link in footer
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention third-party attribution or branding requirements. Footer includes 'Built with caffeine.ai' link with UTM parameters.
